metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: An aggregate function is a function that performs a calculation on a set of values, and returns a single value.
content.html: An aggregate function is a function that performs a calculation on a set of values, and returns a single value.

content.text: Aggregate functions are often used with the GROUP BY clause of the SELECT statement. The GROUP BY clause splits the result-set into groups of values and the aggregate function can be used to return a single value for each group.
content.html: Aggregate functions are often used with the GROUP BY clause of the SELECT statement. The GROUP BY clause splits the result-set into groups of values and the aggregate function can be used to return a single value for each group.

content.html: The most commonly used SQL aggregate functions are:

content.text: Aggregate functions ignore null values (except for COUNT() ).
We will go through the aggregate functions above in the next chapters.
content.html: We will go through the aggregate functions above in the next chapters.
